name: To verify when user select file instead of image

steps.name: When User logged into system for file
And click on PIM menu for file
And click on add employee button for file
And user enters firstname as for file
And enter Middle,Last Name and click save for file
And click on image icon for file
Then It should display error message as 'File type not allowed'
